product.short-description: Take your game to another level with Wilson’s Pro Staff racket. Co-designed by Roger Federer, it has a classic feel and a bold design, with meticulous attention to detail, including engineered paint finishes and textures, chrome touches, and laser engraving. With a larger head size, providing a bigger sweet spot and better precision, the Pro Staff is the racket every avid competitor needs.

product.short-description: Much has been written about Britain’s fascinating Prime Minister, Winston Churchill. This trilogy, covering 30 years of writing about the wartime leader, includes historical documents, maps, and photographs. Writers William Manchester and Paul Reid provide a depth to Churchill, with fascinating anecdotes and insight throughout their books (The Last Lion: Winston Spencer Churchill - Visions of Glory, 1874-1932; The Last Lion: Winston Spencer Churchill – Alone, 1932-1940; The Last Lion: Winston Spencer Churchill - Defender of the Realm, 1940-1965). Each book has a custom jacket, which together shows a 1943 photograph of the prime minister leaving 10 Downing Street, while the front and back covers of each volume feature his oil paintings.
product.long-description:
• Weight: 10.0 lb
  • Dimensions: 6.5"d; 6"w x 9.5"h
  • Publisher: Little Brown

product.short-description: A set of three skateboard decks featuring a reproduction of a work by New York artist, Jean-Michel Basquiat, who was known for his raw, graffiti-like style, and scrawled text. The screen-printed decks come with a printed signature on the back, and can be displayed as pieces of art. The boards are crafted in Maplewood by Skateroom, which collaborated with the artist’s estate on this project, and will donate up to 30% of proceeds of each edition to support Skateistan, a non-profit that uses skateboarding and education for youth empowerment in Afghanistan, Cambodia, and South Africa.
product.long-description:
• 7 ply sustainable Grade-A Canadian Maplewood
  • Deck dimensions: 31"h x 8"w
  • Mounting hardware included
  • Copyright Estate of Jean-Michel Basquiat. Licensed by Artestar, New York

product.short-description: This printer allows you to download images directly from your Android or iOS smartphone as an effortless way to reproduce quality color or black and white photographs. Using thermal transfer technology, the images won’t bleed or fade, and the quality is good enough for an array of uses, from family photographs to a child’s art project.

  • Features 5-pin micro USB for Android and an iOS USB adaptor for alternatively printing from an iPhone, iPad, digital camera or USB memory stick
  • Printer doubles as a cordless charging dock that can power up to two devices
  • Imported

product.short-description: Experience a more comfortable shave with this heated razor by GilletteLabs. With no wait time required, the razor instantly warms at the push of a button, and features adjustable temperature levels. Gillette’s best blades combined with FlexDisc™ technology also ensure a smooth shave. Designed in Germany, this waterproof razor can be used in the shower or at the sink, and includes a premium-grade aluminum zinc handle for an overall stylish look and feel.
product.long-description:
• Includes Heated Razor, magnetic charging dock and plug, 2 GilletteLabs blade cartridges
  • Subscribe to receive starter kit on your first order and 4 blades ($25) at your chosen reorder frequency
  • Use with GilletteLabs blade cartridges designed exclusively for this product
  • Two levels of heat (109°F/43°C and 122°F/50°C)
  • Wireless magnetic charging provides up to 6 shaves from a single charge, depending on usage

product.short-description: The latest expression from small-batch producer Casa Dragones is a 100% Blue Agave Añejo, matured in new French Oak and new American Oak barrels, which are toasted to impart delicate notes of cacao, fig, and spice. Tequila Añejo is a perfect choice for whiskey drinkers, and has been crafted to be sipped neat or on the rocks, as well as in cocktails. Available in a smoked gray glass bottle that is individually numbered and signed to correspond to each 500-case batch, this elegant barrel blend tequila makes a perfect gift.

product.short-description: The Heriz Noir Slipper is the perfect way to lift a simple outfit, such as black cigarette pants and a cashmere sweater. The upper is crafted in needlepoint, inspired by Persian rug design, and finished with a neutral leather trim. These slip-ons are as comfortable as they are stylish.

This fragrant Earl Grey is a classic combination of black tea paired with bergamot oil, providing a refreshing drink that can be enjoyed any time of day. Made by Fortnum & Mason, supplier of tea to the royal houses for over 300 years, this loose-leaf tea comes in an attractive tin that you will continue to use long after it is finished.

Delicious and beautiful, Carriage House Cookies makes organic shortbread embellished with edible pressed flowers. Each batch of a dozen features a handpicked assortment that includes Nasturtiums, Viola, Chrysanthemum, Pansy, Marigold, Lavender, Cornflower, Daisy, Calendula, Lilac, as well as other seasonal varieties.

A 20th century American classic, The Great Gatsby follows the enduring love affair between Jay Gatsby and Daisy Buchanan against the backdrop of the Jazz Age and Long Island’s lavish parties. This edition has been updated to include F. Scott Fitzgerald’s final revisions and features a note on the composition and text, a personal foreword by the author’s granddaughter, Eleanor Lanahan, and a new introduction by two-time National Book Award winner, Jesmyn Ward.

A must-have tool for anyone interested in making craft cocktails, this durable beechwood hammer and canvas bag allows you to crush your own ice in small amounts. Ideal for frozen cocktails. Former professional bartender, Geoffrey Wilson, started Glacio in 2015.

A refreshing drink that offers all the qualities of a craft cocktail, minus the alcohol. With notes of English Peas, Hay, and Hops, it is also infused with a herbal base of Spearmint, Thyme, and Rosemary. Seedlip is an English drinks company inspired by a 17th century book of non-alcoholic distilled herbal remedies, and founder Ben Branson’s 300-year farming heritage.

Add a Bohemian layer to your look with this velvet gilet with mandarin collar. Embroidered with a floral Paisley pattern and embellished with brass studs and ornate brass buttons, it is versatile enough to pair with jeans and a silk shirt, or over a dress on a night out.

Crafted using grains from organic farms in the upper Midwest, and infused with juniper, elderflower, lemon grass and angelica, this small-batch gin offers a fragrant, floral taste that is not too dry. A good all-rounder to include in your home bar.

product.display-name: The Art of Mixology: Classic Cocktails and Curious Concoctions
product.short-description: This anthology of classic and contemporary cocktail recipes is a must-have for entertaining. It features over 200 recipes to suit every occasion, including a helpful image of how the drink should be presented. Sectioned into alcohol categories, including a mocktail section, it is easy to use and a perfect gift for budding mixologists.

Julia B.’s couture-quality linens are made in line with her brand’s ethos, Handmade for Life.

Baked in small batches from sliced Idaho potatoes, Thins are crisp, delicious, and an excellent choice for appetizers, hors d'oeuvres, and dips. Legendary specialist food store William Poll has been serving European-style delicacies on New York’s Upper East Side since opening in 1921.

These no-guilt gummies offer all the juiciness of real fruit without any additives and only natural fruit sugars. Imported from Germany, they are made from 25% fruit juice, including grapes, sour cherries, raspberry, black currant, blackberry, and elderberry. Fill bowls with this delicious fruity treat when entertaining.

Add a personal touch to entertaining by writing individual menus using this beautiful template, engraved with gold on luxurious cream paper and presented as a set of 10. Bernard Maisner is a master calligrapher and stationer whose name is associated with high-profile society events and special occasions.

This elegant, tapered glass with a subtly hued gray base was handmade in Venice. Master glassmaker Davide Fuin’s expertly crafted pieces are a contemporary interpretation of traditional Murano glassware, and bring an artisanal beauty to a table setting.

Featuring a vibrant floral design, the Posie sheet set in printed cotton percale is hand-finished with a wavy white bias. Sheet sets include one top sheet, one flat bottom sheet, and two king pillow shams.

Expertly made by artisans, this perfectly proportioned chair is crafted from a mahogany frame enhanced with the warm tones and stylish texture of rattan. The legs are further elevated with brass ends caps, while a plump seat cushion ensures a comfortable dining experience.

This 1955 Palm Beach sunbathing image from legendary photographer Slim Aarons is fun and stylish. Framed and ready to hang, it adds a touch of retro glamour to a room.
Beautifully crafted with a decorative rattan pattern and topped with a plump, squared-off cushion, this versatile bench is ideal for a hallway or the end of a bed.
This expertly crafted console in wicker and rattan has a ripple effect design that was inspired by ocean waves. Topped by a clear glass top as a solid base for lights and vases.
Inspired by the silhouette of a skirted chair, crafted in woven rattan, this piece has an easy elegance that is ideal for a relaxed dining room. It comes with a plump seat cushion for added comfort.

This lifelike lush palm with ample fronds created by Diane James, a brand known for its faux floral couture, has a refreshing charm. The plant is presented in a terra cotta vase, patterned with a curving design and aged with preserved moss. An effortless, stylish addition to a hallway or sheltered terrace.

A sweet pajama set for little ones, crafted in super-soft cotton printed with red hearts. A hand-carved spoon with a folksy feel that is both practical and attractive. custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne
Beauty > Iris Meadow Collection > Fragrance > Eau de Parfum

product.short-description: Like sunlight reflecting on water, bright Sicilian Bergamot and Lush Dewy Greens entice the senses for an invigorating, luminous first impression. Delicate, yet alluring Waterlily and softly exotic Jasmine Sambac add layers of depth and intensity, warmed by sweetly inviting Musk. The effect is bright, dewy and fresh.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Watery
  • Notes: Sicilian Bergamot, Waterlily, Jasmine Sambac, Musk

product.short-description: Inspired by the English countryside, Garden Rose is the perfect way to make this beautiful flower part of your life every day. This lively fragrance combines the fresh floral notes of White Bulgarian Rose, full-bodied Rose Bulgare, and Rose Centifolia with the natural green notes of Geranium. Sandalwood, Amber, and Musk add a warm finishing touch.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Fresh Floral Rose
  • Notes: White Bulgarian Rose, Rose Bulgare, Rose Centifolia, Geranium, Sandalwood, Amber, Musk
  • 6.7 oz

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

product.short-description: Make rose part of your life every day with this beautiful scent inspired by Aerin's garden on the eastern shores of Long Island. Top notes of Orange Flower and Lemon Leaves create a vivid freshness through the heart of White Bulgarian Rose, Ylang Ylang, Coconut Water, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Bulgarian Rose Oil, and Rose Bouton, while Vanilla, Amber, and Vetiver bring a golden glow.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Rose Oriental
  • Notes: Orange, Lemon, White Bulgarian Rose, Ylang Ylang, Coconut Water, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Bulgarian Rose Oil, Rose Bouton, Vanilla, Amber, Vetiver
  • 6.7 oz

product.short-description: Kyoto's stunning moss gardens and Arashiyama bamboo grove were the inspiration for Bamboo Rose, a perfect everyday scent. White Bulgarian Rose, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Rose Infusion, and Rose Centifolia are enhanced by cool Jasmine Petals, while Sicilian Bergamot, Mandarin Blossom, and dewy Green Leaves add a refreshing note.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Green Floral Rose
  • Notes: White Bulgarian Rose, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Rose Infusion, Rose Centifolia, Jasmine, Sicilian Bergamot, Mandarin, Pink Pepper, Amber, Musk
  • 6.7 oz

page-attributes.page-title: AERIN Bamboo Rose 6.7 oz Eau De Parfum
page-attributes.page-description: Envision Kyoto’s moss gardens and Arashiyama’s bamboo groves, the inspiration for this everday scent featuring rose blends, jasmine petals and much more.

product.short-description: A green floral rose blend that brings to mind the formal beauty and simplicity of an Asian garden. Top notes of Sicilian Bergamot and Mandarin Blossom fuse with Green Leaves to create a delicate, feminine scent. A profusion of White Bulgarian Rose, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Rose Infusion, and Rose Centifolia is enhanced by cool Jasmine Petals. Pink Pepper, Amber, and Musk add the final touch.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Green Floral Rose
  • Notes: White Bulgarian Rose, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Rose Infusion, Rose Centifolia, Jasmine, Sicilian Bergamot, Mandarin, Pink Pepper, Amber, Musk
  • 6.7 oz

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Perfume & Cologne

product.long-description:
A fresh floral rose that takes you into the English countryside, filled with the irrepressible scent of wild roses. The lively, lush, and free-spirited scent opens with the natural green notes of Geranium wrapped around fresh Rose Bouton Sauvage. The heart reveals the splendor of White Bulgarian Rose, Rose Bulgare, and Rose Centifolia. Enhanced with the smooth warmth of Sandalwood and Amber, and softened by Musk. This convenient rollerball design is ideal for traveling or when you are on the go.
  • 8ml (.27fl. oz.)

product.short-description: A floral amber rose that evokes the joy of a relaxed casual day at the beach with cool white linen sundresses and sun-kissed roses.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Rose Oriental
  • Notes: White Bulgarian Rose, Ylang Ylang, Coconut Water, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Bulgarian Rose Oil, Rose Bouton, Vanilla Amber, Vetiver
  • 8 ml (.27 fl oz)

product.short-description: My warm-weather fragrance evoking shimmering beaches and azure sea.
product.long-description:
Escape to the sun-drenched, azure-blue Mediterranean. Mediterranean Honeysuckle takes you there, evoking lush flowers and shimmering beaches. Three luxurious fragrance experiences designed to be enjoyed alone or layered. Set features:
  • 1.7 oz./50 ML Eau de Parfum fragrance
  • 5 oz./150 ML Body Cream
  • 6.2 oz./176 g Soap

Amber Musk is a warm, inviting scent you want to wrap yourself in, like a soft cozy blanket on a cold, snowy night. -Aerin

Effortless elegance. Three luxurious fragrance experiences designed to be enjoyed alone or layered.

This set features:

  • 1.7 oz./50 ML Amber Musk Eau de Parfum
  • 5 oz./150 ML Amber Musk Body Cream
  • 6.2 oz./176 g Amber Musk Soap

product.display-name: Amber Musk D'Or Eau De Parfum
product.short-description: Amber Musk turns to gold, enveloping your senses in its soft, inviting world. Plush notes of Magnolia Leaves splashed with Coconut Water take you to a heart of delicate Muguet and Rose Centifolia Absolute. Luminous Oud Accord, Golden Ambrox, and a Rich Amber Accord add power, sensuality, and dark opulence. The warmth of Sandalwood, Praline, Musk, Benzoin and Incense linger, shimmering like gold in the air.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Oriental Woody Amber
  • Notes: Magnolia, Coconut Water, Muguet, Rose Centifolia Absolute, Oud, Ambrox, Amber, Sandalwood, Praline, Musk, Benzoin, Incense
  • 3.4 oz

product.display-name: Evening Rose D'Or Eau De Parfum
product.short-description: Evening Rose turns to gold. The allure of night in the city deepens with notes of vibrant Juicy Blackberry, Lychee, and Pink Pepper. At the intense heart, Rose Centifolia and Bulgarian Rose Absolute blend with the modern sensuality and magnetism of Miel de Provence Absolute. An intriguing aura of Incense, Patchouli, Amber, and creamy Leather lingers, shimmering like gold in the air.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Rose Amber
  • Notes: Blackberry, Lychee, Pink Pepper, Rose Centifolia, Bulgarian Rose Absolute, Incense, Patchouli, Amber, Leather
  • 3.4 oz

image.alt: Evening Rose D'Or Eau De Parfum
image.title: Evening Rose D'Or Eau De Parfum

product.display-name: Tangier Vanille D'Or Eau De Parfum
product.short-description: Tangier Vanille turns to gold, taking you into the mystery and splendor of Morocco. The heart of Madagascar Vanilla glides through crisp, sun-drenched Italian Bergamot, Black Plum, and rich Bulgarian Rose, becoming even more hypnotic with notes of Saffron and Myrrh. The sultry trail of Cashmere Wood, Crystallized Amber, Tonka Bean, and Sandalwood lingers, shimmering like gold in the air.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Fluid Oriental Vanilla
  • Notes: Madagascar Vanilla, Italian Bergamot, Black Plum, Bulgarian Rose, Saffron, Myrrh, Cashmere Wood, Crystallized Amber, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood
  • 3.4 oz

image.alt: Tangier Vanille D'Or Eau De Parfum
image.title: Tangier Vanille D'Or Eau De Parfum

product.short-description: The rose is a timeless symbol of beauty and femininity. Like an original piece of art, Rose de Grasse is meticulously crafted with an artisanal attention to detail. Now, the rose turns to gold. Drawing you into its mysterious, fragrant heart, the rose fusion of Rose Otto Bulgarian, Rose Absolute, and hundred-petaled Rose Centifolia is blended with a sultry top note of Ambrette Seeds. Luxurious Oud and other woods, Labdanum and Leather combine refined polish, earthy passion, and dark intrigue. The touch of Ambrox and Musk lingers, shimmering like gold in the air.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Rich Floral Rose

product.short-description: The Galatina Fig scented candle was inspired by the town of Galatina, a hidden gem in Italy. The sweet greens of Fig are uplifted by the sparkling fragrance of Olive Flower, while a hint of warm, velvety Ambrox adds an enticing depth. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.

  • Made in Italy
  • Suede
  • Inside Pocket

  • Made in Italy
  • Leather and Suede

product.short-description: A casual clutch that conjures up images of a laidback vacation, the AERIN Raffia Bag has a double tassel and small heart details in two color combinations that add a modern, fun touch.
product.long-description:
• Raffia with 100% cotton lining
  • Zipper closure
  • Dimensions: 10.0"h x 13.0"w
  • Expect a slight variation in tone due to hand-woven techniques and the naturally occurring color differences in raffia

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Fashion > Raffia Collection > Pouches & Clutches > Pouch

product.short-description: This unstructured straw hat was crafted in a fine crochet weave by female artisans in rural Ecuador. Its classic silhouette is enhanced with a scalloped trim in a pale blue hue, which is a stylish contrast to the natural color of the Toquilla straw. It is a versatile accessory with a malleable brim, which can be folded for travel, and is equally suited to wear on the beach or paired with a maxi dress for a summer party.
product.long-description:
• Size: 22.5"-22.9" circumference (57.15- 58.16 cm)
  • Brim width: 3.5"-4" (8.89- 9.91 cm)
  • 100% Toquilla straw
  • Handle with care. Avoid contact with water. Spot clean only
  • Expect slight variations in color and dimensions due to the handmade process and natural materials
  • Made in Ecuador

product.display-name: Classic Three Drop Earring, Natural Straw
product.long-description:
Make an impact with these AERIN exclusive drop earrings by Rebecca de Ravenel, available in a warm straw hue. These clip-ons feature silk cord-wrapped balls and are exceptionally lightweight, meaning you can wear them for a lengthy period of time without pull.
  • Size: 3" long
  • Button Silk-Like Cording, Brass Chain, Gold Plated Pewter Clip
  • Care: Due to their delicate nature, handle carefully to avoid crushing. Be careful with make-up to avoid staining.
  • Made in India

image.alt: Classic Three Drop Earring, Natural Straw
image.title: Classic Three Drop Earring, Natural Straw

product.short-description: Elevate a mix of bangles by adding this stylish gold bead bracelet to your wrist. Versatile and effortless, the 14k gold-filled beads are strung on an elastic cord, which offers a slight stretch. Karen Lazar’s easy-to-wear jewelry for women, men, and children is handmade in Los Angeles.
product.long-description:
• 14k gold
  • Size: 6.5"
  • Bead diameter: 4mm
  • Do not pull or yank bracelets
  • The elastic is for easy on and off. When rolling on, touch your hand the entire time and do not stretch more than the widest part of your knuckles, thumb to pinky
  • Water safe
  • Made in USA

product.short-description: A versatile bracelet that you can mix and match, stack or wear alone for a subtle touch of gold.
product.long-description:
A versatile classic that you can mix and match, stack or wear alone for a subtle touch of gold.
  • Yellow Gold Filled
  • Stretchy
  • One size fits wrists 5.75" to 7"

product.display-name: Yellow Gold & Turquoise Small Bead Bracelet
product.short-description: Elevate a mix of bangles and add a pop of color with this stylish gold and turquoise bead bracelet. Versatile and effortless, the faceted Turquoise stones and 14k gold-filled beads are strung on an elastic cord, which offers a slight stretch. Karen Lazar’s easy-to-wear jewelry for women, men, and children is handmade in Los Angeles.

• 14k gold, turquoise
  • Size: 6.5"

  • Do not pull or yank bracelets

product.short-description: The rose is a timeless symbol of beauty and femininity. Like an original piece of art, Rose de Grasse is meticulously crafted with an artisanal attention to detail. At its heart is a fusion of roses including the hundred-petaled Rose Centifolia, hand-picked in Grasse, the French capital of perfumery since the 16th century where the history of fragrance is art.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Rich Floral Rose
  • Notes: Ambrette Seeds, Rose Centifolia, Rose Otto Bulgarian, Rose Absolute, Ambrox, Musk

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Beauty > Rose de Grasse Collection > Fragrance > Parfum

product.short-description: An exquisite fragrance inspired by the white Tuberose flower. The perfect daytime scent, it captures the fresh, bright perfume of delicate buds gathered in India at dawn. Sun-drenched Neroli, Orange Flower, cool Jasmine, and the smooth woodiness of Cashmeran and Cedarwood are combined in this luminous fragrance.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Fresh Floral Tuberose
  • Notes: Tuberose Absolute, Tuberose Dawn Accord, Neroli, Orange Flower Absolute, Jasmine, Cashmeran, Cedarwood

product.short-description: An exquisite fragrance inspired by the white Tuberose flower. The perfect daytime scent, it captures the fresh, bright perfume of delicate buds gathered in India at dawn. product.short-description: Turn a room into a warm and cozy retreat with the AERIN Amber Musk scented candle. Ambrox makes a velvety first impression, contrasted by a succulent burst of Coconut Water and the femininity of Rose Centifolia and Muguet. Like the glow of amber flames, lingering Benzoin, Sandalwood, and Musk infuses the scent with warmth.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Oriental Woody Amber
  • Notes: Ambrox, Coconut Water, Rose Centifolia, Muguet, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Musk
  • White candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 40 hours
  • 7 oz

product.short-description: Make the perfect escape into a sun-drenched azure-blue world with the AERIN Mediterranean Honeysuckle scented candle. Notes of Honeysuckle, Bergamot, Grapefruit, Gardenia and Musk evoke lush flowers and shimmering beaches.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Citrus
  • Notes: Honeysuckle, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Mandarin, Lily of the Valley, Gardenia, Jasmine Sambac Absolute
  • White candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 40 hours
  • 7 oz

product.short-description: Transform a room into a blooming springtime garden with the AERIN Lilac Path scented candle. It weaves a delicate story of crisp greens, rich blooms, and delicate petals with notes of Galbanum, Honeysuckle, Jasmine, Angelica Seed Oil, Orange Flower, Lilac and Privet Flower.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Green
  • Notes: Lilac, Galbanum, Jasmine Lactones, Angelica Seed Oil, Orange Flower
  • White candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 40 hours
  • 7 oz

Enjoy a Limited Edition, hand-painted bottle of Mediterranean Honeysuckle. This unique bottle has been embellished with a delicate flower, reminiscent of the artisanal ingredients in this fragrance.
Escape to the sun-drenched, azure-blue Mediterranean. Sweet Honeysuckle and sparkling Grapefruit take you there, evoking lush flowers and shimmering beaches. Italian Bergamot, sun-warmed and citrusy and Mandarin Oil impart lasting freshness. Lily of the Valley and lush Gardenia build to the sensuality and richness of Jasmine Sambac Absolute. A fragrance as magical and elegant as its inspiration.

Enjoy a Limited Edition, hand-painted bottle of Amber Musk. This unique bottle has been embellished with a delicate flower, reminiscent of the artisanal ingredients in this fragrance.
"Amber Musk is a warm, inviting scent you want to wrap yourself in - like a soft cozy blanket on a cold snowy night." - Aerin
Amber Musk blends sensual florals, distinctive amber and creamy musk. Ambrox makes a velvety first impression, contrasted by a succulent burst of Coconut Water and the femininity of Rose Centifolia Absolute. Like the glow of amber flames, lingering Benzoin & Musk infuses the fragrance with warmth.

product.short-description: The rose is a timeless symbol of beauty and femininity. Like an original piece of art, Rose de Grasse is meticulously crafted with an artisanal attention to detail. At its heart is a fusion of roses including the hundred-petaled Rose Centifolia, hand-picked in Grasse, the French capital of perfumery since the 16th century where the history of fragrance is art.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Rich Floral Rose
  • Notes: Ambrette Seeds, Rose Centifolia, Rose Otto Bulgarian, Rose Absolute, Ambrox, Musk

product.short-description: Coral Palm captures the Palm Beach lifestyle of sunny days, indigo nights, the bright blue sea and sky, and glorious coral sunsets. Citrus top notes of Bergamot and Sicilian Lemon sparkle with Freesia Petals and Dewy Greens. At its center is velvety Tuberose, Ylang, Golden Gardenia, and Heliotrope, mingled with final rich notes of Coconut Milk, Cedarwood, and Vanilla to create a balmy, tropical blend. This convenient rollerball design is ideal for traveling or when you are on the go.
product.long-description: • 8ml (.27fl. oz.)

The tiles include Arabic numerals to help familiarize players with the Chinese characters and symbols.

• Embossed shagreen
  • Suede lining
  • Brass hardware

  • Clean with a dry cloth

product.short-description: A classic shape adds some retro appeal.
Luxurious textures like shagreen are perfect for a home bar.

The Nendaz Cypress scented candle was inspired by the Alpine resort of Nendaz in Switzerland. A jewel in the heart of the Four Valleys region with stunning evergreen forests and soaring peaks. The fragrance captures an invigorating fresh winter's day in the Swiss Alps. Its fragrant aroma of Cypress is uplifted with the clarifying properties of White Spruce, and further enhanced by the woody greens of Fir Balsam. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Cypress, White Spruce, Guaiac Wood, Fir Balsam
  • Glass Vessel
  • Brass Lid
  • Approximate Burn Time: 60 Hours

product.short-description: Assouline's deluxe new book, Aspen Style, has perfectly captured what makes Aspen, Colorado, so special. With 300 pages and over 250 illustrations, it charts Aspen's rise from small mining camp during the Colorado Silver Boom in the late 19th century to laid back ski resort. Introduction by longtime Aspen resident, Aerin Lauder. A beautiful coffee table book.
product.long-description:
• Published by Assouline
  • Dimensions: 10" x 13"
  • 300 Pages, Over 250 Illustrations
  • Hardcover with Jacket
  • ISBN: 9781614286226

product.short-description: Richly layered, inspiring, and one of my favorite magazines.
product.long-description:
Contact the AERIN NEW YORK store for availability

(212) 843-0440
newyork@aerin.com
Martina Mondadori Sartogoâ€™s luxurious biannual magazine features a curated selection of homes captured by world-famous photographers, plus stories written by a host of tastemakers and aesthetes. Printed on weighty paper with covers swathed in actual fabric or wallpaper, it has been a collectors item from its launch. This limited edition issue of Cabana, created in collaboration with Ralph Lauren, comes in a unique box set crafted in decorated calfskin leather. This edition includes Ralph Lauren's home in Bedford, New York.
  • Issue released: November 2017
  • Composition: Paper, Calfskin Leather
  • Made in Italy

product.short-description: Three ways to enjoy this summery floral and citrus scent.
product.long-description:
Mediterranean Honeysuckle evokes lush flowers and shimmering beaches with citrusy fresh notes of Italian Bergamot and Mandarin oil, combined with sparkling notes of Lily of the Valley, lush Gardenia, and sensual Jasmine Sambac Absolute. This beautifully boxed, limited edition set is perfect for Mother's Day gifting, providing three fragrance experiences designed to be enjoyed alone or layered: an Eau de Parfum, luxurious body cream, and a rollerball applicator that is perfect for a handbag or travel.
  • 1.7 oz./50 ml Eau de Parfum Fragrance
  • 5 oz./150 ml Body Cream
  • 0.27 oz./8 ml Rollerball

product.short-description: The Tuberose Le Jour scented candle captures the fresh, bright perfume of delicate White Tuberose buds gathered in India at dawn. Sun-drenched Neroli, Orange Flower, cool Jasmine, and the smooth woodiness of Cashmeran and Cedarwood provide a luminous fragrance. The Tuberose Le Jour candle comes in a delicate pink vessel with a gold lid, and is tied with a creamy ribbon, perfect for gifting.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Fresh Floral Tuberose
  • Notes: Tuberose Absolute, Tuberose Dawn Accord, Neroli, Orange Flower Absolute, Jasmine, Cashmeran, Cedarwood
  • White candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 45 hours
  • 7.5 oz

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Home & Garden > Decor > Home Fragrances > Candles

product.short-description: The Tuberose Le Soir scented candle evokes the rich, sensual scent of Tuberose in full bloom, harvested in India as the sun sets, and is ideal for a relaxing evening. Sparkling Mandarin, Bergamot, Ylang Ylang, smooth Sandalwood, and Vanilla provide a luxurious, elegant warmth. The Tuberose Le Soir candle comes in a creamy rose vessel with a gold lid, and is tied with a cream ribbon, perfect for gifting.
product.long-description:
• Scent: Floral Tuberose Amber
  • Notes: Tuberose Absolute Essence, Tuberose Dusk Accord, Mandarin, Bergamot, Vetiver, Oakmoss
  • White candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 45 hours
  • 7.5 oz

Enjoy a Limited Edition, hand-painted bottle of Hibiscus Palm. This unique bottle has been embellished with delicate flowers, reminiscent of the artisanal ingredients in this fragrance. Journey to a palm-fringed, tropical island. Hibiscus Palm captures the island scent of brilliant sunshine on a lush beach. Accords of Lotus Flower and Hibiscus Palm mingle with Ylang and exotic Ginger. Frangipani blends with a heart of fragrant White Blossoms, wrapped in the velvety warmth of Coconut Milk, Vanilla and Musk.

  • Notes: Galbanum, Lentisque Absolute, Citrus, Magnolia, Jasmine, Vetiver

product.short-description: This collaboration between AERIN and High Camp Supply, the online purveyor of beautifully boxed gardenias, combines crisp, fresh flowers with the AERIN Gilded Clover Small Vase, delivered to your door. The Vine and Bloom box of 30 gardenias includes a nest of loose fresh flowers surrounded by over two dozen budding vine gardenias on 8-10 inch stems. The ceramic, gold-plated Clover vase, crafted in Italy and inspired by a vintage piece, is a beautiful way to present these exquisite short-stemmed flowers. This exclusive bundle, packaged in a white High Camp Supply signature box, is ideal for gifting.
product.long-description:
• Order cut off time is 2pm ET for shipments Tuesday-Saturday, no shipments on Sunday or Monday.
  • For delivery on a specific date, email service@aerin.com after placing your order. Otherwise, the bundle will ship out that evening or the next business day, depending on the order time.
  • Gift message available at checkout.
  • Retail value is $534: AERIN Gilded Clover Small Vase ($350 value) + High Camp Vine & Bloom Box ($149 value) + $35 FedEx Priority Overnight Shipping

product.short-description: The Uzes Tuberose scented candle was inspired by the medieval town of Uzes in southern France. Its fragrance is infused with an alluring blend of Tuberose enhanced with fruity Apricot, and a warming hint of spicy Clove. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Tuberose, Apricot, Clove
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The L'Ansecoy Orange Blossom scented candle was inspired by the laid-back vibe of Mustique. Its fragrance captures the flora that lines the island's beaches, with sun-kissed orange blossom and sweet Cedar enhanced by the greens and citrus of Petitgrain. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Petit Grain, Orange Blossom, Cedar
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Caffarella Vine scented candle was inspired by Parco Della Caffarella in Rome, a sprawling valley of beautiful green pastures, woodland, and meadows. Its fragrance captures this pastoral scene with crisp Green Ivy, blended with alluring Waterlily and complemented with hints of woody Musk. The elegant packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Green Ivy, Waterlily, and Musk
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Buckhorn Amber scented candle was inspired by the exhilarating Buckhorn ski run in Aspen. Its fragrance is an ode to the landscape, with the aroma of rich, woody Amber layered with Sandalwood and lifted with a luminous floral note of Orchid. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Amber, Sandalwood, Orchid
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Salzburg Pine candle was inspired by Salzburg, Austria, a city of spires, Mozart, and baroque architecture surrounded by soaring peaks that offer beautiful alpine views. Its fragrance captures the fresh evergreen of the Alps, with Pine and Fir Balsam, enhanced with a spicy infusion of Cinnamon and Clove. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Pine and Fir Balsam, Cinnamon, and Clove
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Tumbatu Sandalwood scented candle was inspired by Tumbatu, an island off the east coast of Tanzania with white sandy beaches surrounded by crystal water and a colorful coral reef. Its fragrance captures this exotic destination, with an aromatic blend of Osyris Sandalwood Accord and Cedar enhanced with warming Ginger and a hint of Incense. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift. This candle has an approximate burn time of 60 hours.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Osyris Sandalwood Accord, Cedar, Ginger
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Sintra Gardenia scented candle was inspired by the exquisite town of Sintra in Portugal, sitting amidst pine-covered hills. Its fragrance captures the exotic gardens and location with fragrant Lush Gardenia, delicious Cinnamon, and a deep evergreen scent of Cedarwood. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Lush Gardenia, Cinnamon, Orange Flower, Cedarwood
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: The Monserrate Rose scented candle captures the romance of Monserrate Park and Palace in Sintra, Portugal. The ornate palace sits above expansive gardens planted with species from every corner of the world, from roses and azaleas to bamboo and cork trees. Velvety Rose Centifolia provides a luscious floral note, while sunny Gardenia adds a sparkling intensity that is further enhanced by an infusion of alluring Sandalwood. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Rose Centifolia, Gardenia, Sandalwood
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 50 hours

product.short-description: Sun-kissed orange blossom lifts the spirits.
product.long-description:
A paired back, smaller version of the original L'Ansecoy Orange Blossom scented candle, which was inspired by the laid-back vibe of Mustique. Its fragrance captures the flora that lines the islands beaches, with sun-kissed orange blossom and sweet Cedar enhanced by the greens and citrus of Petitgrain. The beautiful packaging, created by artist Helen Dealtry, makes it a perfect gift.
  • Notes: Petit Grain, Orange Blossom, and Cedar
  • Cream Candle
  • Glass Vessel
  • Size: 6.7oz
  • Approximate Burn Time: 50 Hours

product.short-description: The Sintra Gardenia scented candle was inspired by the exquisite town of Sintra in Portugal, sitting amidst pine-covered hills. Its fragrance captures the exotic gardens and location with fragrant Lush Gardenia, delicious Cinnamon, and a deep evergreen scent of Cedarwood. Presented in a white glass vessel enhanced with a gold lid that the candle can sit in when in use, it is a beautiful addition to a table and makes a perfect gift.
product.long-description:
• Notes: Lush Gardenia, Cinnamon, Orange Flower, Cedarwood
  • Cream candle in glass vessel
  • Burn time: 55 hours

product.short-description: Lovely thank you cards inspired by the sea.
product.long-description:
A set of 10 peel and seal envelopes and 10 notecards in pale blue, hand printed with a shell and seaweed design. This stationary set works perfectly for invitations and thank you cards.
  • Envelope Dimensions & Weight: 161mm (6.3" approx.) x 114 mm (4.5" approx.); 135gm
  • Notecard Dimensions & Weight: 105mm (4.1" approx.) x 148mm (5.8" approx.); 350gm
  • The quality paper stock is sourced from an English paper mill which uses FSC managed forests for sustainability.
  • Fully recyclable and biodegradable, everything in the set is ECF certified meaning no heavy metals or chlorine have been used in the bleaching process.
  • Hand printed in England

product.display-name: AERIN x High Camp Supply Gardenias in a Gold Vase
product.short-description: This collaboration between AERIN and High Camp Supply, the online purveyor of beautifully boxed gardenias, combines crisp, fresh flowers with the Marion Gilded Round Vase, delivered to your door. The Vine and Bloom option of 30 gardenias includes a nest of loose fresh flowers surrounded by over two dozen budding vine gardenias on 8-10 inch stems, packaged in a white High Camp Supply signature box. The ceramic, gilded Marion vase has a smooth finish and a low, spherical form and is a beautiful way to present these exquisite short-stemmed flowers. The vase is shipped at the same time as the flowers and arrives in a signature AERIN box. This exclusive bundle is ideal for gifting
product.long-description:
• AERIN Marion Gilded Round Vase
  • High Camp Vine and Bloom White Box
  • Order cut off time is 2pm ET for shipments Monday-Friday, no shipments on Saturday or Sunday.
  • For delivery on a specific date, email service@aerin.com after placing your order. Otherwise, the bundle will ship out that evening or the next business day, depending on the order time.
  • Gift message available at checkout.
  • The gardenias and vase will be shipped at the same time and arrive in separate boxes.
  • Price: $454
  • Retail value is $529 (AERIN vase $375 value + High Camp Vine & Bloom Box $129 + $25 FedEx Priority Overnight Shipping)

product.short-description: Beck’s Le Margherite earrings were inspired by the 1960s glamour of Brigitte Bardot. Hand-crafted from 14k gold paired with Swarovski Crystal Crimson Coral Pearls, these stud earrings are a vibrant addition to any outfit and work equally well day and night. Combining quality and sustainability, Beck Jewels’ vibrant and artistic pieces reflect the Caribbean island of Curaçao, where its Brooklyn-based designer Rebecca Zeijdel-Paz grew up.
product.long-description:
• Dimensions: 1"h x 1"w
  • Swarovski Crystal Crimson Coral Pearls, 14k gold-filled metal
  • For pierced ears
  • Avoid contact with cosmetics, perfumes, lotions, oils, and water (particularly salted water and chlorine)
  • Gently wipe jewelry with a soft cloth after use. Store in accompanying pouch or closed jewelry box
  • Expect slight variations due to the artisanal nature of production
  • Made in USA

product.short-description: A stylish fedora in natural toquilla handcrafted by artisans in Ecuador. The slightly frayed brim gives it a laidback look, yet the white grosgrain ribbon elevates it, providing a versatile hat that can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.

• Toquilla straw, Gosgrain ribbon
  • Brim: 6-7cm wide
  • Expect slight variation in color and dimensions due to handmade process and natural materials
  • Imported

product.short-description: The wide-brimmed Rosarito by G.Viteri is an ideal sun hat that works equally well on the beach or in the city. Hand woven in straw, it has a subtle frayed edge for a touch of natural style.

  • 100% Toquilla Straw
  • Made in Ecuador
  • This product is handmade from natural materials, therefore color and dimensions may vary slightly

product.display-name: Yellow Gold & Lapis Small Bead Bracelet
product.short-description: Elevate a mix of bangles by adding this stylish gold and lapis bead bracelet to your wrist. Versatile and effortless, the faceted lapis stones and 14k gold-filled beads are strung on an elastic cord, which offers a slight stretch. Karen Lazar’s easy-to-wear jewelry for women, men, and children is handmade in Los Angeles.
product.long-description:
• 14k gold, lapis
  • Size: 6.5"
  • Bead diameter: 2mm
  • Do not pull or yank bracelets
  • The elastic is for easy on and off. When rolling on, touch your hand the entire time and do not stretch more than the widest part of your knuckles, thumb to pinky
  • Water safe
  • Made in USA

product.display-name: AERIN x Johanna Ortiz Lipstick, Cali Aji
product.short-description: AERIN and the Colombian fashion designer, Johanna Ortiz, have partnered to create an exclusive lipstick collection featuring three limited-edition shades that look to Johanna’s Cruise Collection for inspiration. Cali Aji is a semi-matte cherry red that is perfect for a night out. The moisturizing, oil-infused formula contains Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Magnolia Extract, alongside AERIN’s calming Rose Vanilla scent. Each lipstick comes in a signature gold AERIN lipstick case with a textured cap detail, and is packaged in a custom carton showcasing Johanna’s fabric designs. The Cali Aji bug print in bright hues characterizes the feel of tierra caliente.
product.long-description: • .14 oz

product.display-name: AERIN x Johanna Ortiz Lipstick, Tayrona Nude Beach
product.long-description: AERIN and the Colombian fashion designer, Johanna Ortiz, have partnered to create an exclusive lipstick collection featuring three limited-edition shades that look to Johanna’s Cruise Collection for inspiration. Tayrona Nude Beach is a semi-matte nude shade, created from an oil-infused, conditioning formula containing Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Magnolia Extract, alongside AERIN’s calming Rose Vanilla scent. Each lipstick comes in a signature gold AERIN lipstick case with a textured cap detail, and is packaged in a custom carton showcasing Johanna’s fabric designs. The Tayrona Nude Beach botanical print represents a stunning area of natural beauty in the Colombian northern Caribbean region.
